REAL Video Enhancer is a cross-platform application for Linux, Windows, and macOS that provides easy-to-use frame interpolation and video upscaling. ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

ShadeOfColor is a cross-platform C# tool that allows users to hide any file within a PNG image and later recover the original file. It embeds metadata like original file size, name, and a SHA1 hash for integrity checks, making it useful for bypassing email restrictions, cloud storage limitations, or adding a layer of privacy.

Digler is a Go-based tool for digital forensics and data recovery, offering both a command-line interface and a desktop application. It specializes in analyzing disk images and raw devices to recover deleted files, even across different file systems, and supports custom file scanners through plugins.
